|Rank=B
|Title=Illustration of the functional anatomy of the facial nerve
|Description=Visualise the motor, sensitive and secretory innervation of the facial nerve
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=
|Order=14}}
Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.question: What is the primary function of the facial nerve?
question.option_a: To transmit motor signals to the muscles of the face
question.option_b: To transmit sensory signals from the face to the brain
question.option_c: To transmit both motor and sensory signals to and from the face
question.option_d: To control the salivary and lacrimal glands
